statements: SELECT * FROM sensor_data ORDER BY reading DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT sensor_type, value, location FROM sensor_data WHERE location = 'Field A';
SELECT id, sensor_type, reading FROM sensor_data WHERE crop_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' ORDER BY reading ASC;
SELECT * FROM sensor_data WHERE irrigation_status = true AND reading > NOW() - INTERVAL '1 day';
SELECT id, sensor_type, value FROM sensor_data ORDER BY value DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_type = 'temperature' ORDER BY reading DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT id, sensor_type, value FROM sensor_data WHERE crop_id = 'd198f774-6af8-4fdc-b090-1d2baf5c0a6a' AND irrigation_status = TRUE
SELECT sensor_type, AVG(value) AS average_value FROM sensor_data GROUP BY sensor_type HAVING AVG(value) > 50
SELECT * FROM sensor_data WHERE location IN ('Field A', 'Field B', 'Field C') ORDER BY location
SELECT sensor_type, MAX(value) AS max_value, MIN(value) AS min_value FROM sensor_data GROUP BY sensor_type
SELECT * FROM sensors_data
SELECT sensor_name, temperature FROM sensors_data ORDER BY temperature DESC
SELECT sensor_name, humidity FROM sensors_data WHERE sensor_id = 1
SELECT AVG(temperature) AS avg_temp, AVG(humidity) AS avg_humidity FROM sensors_data
SELECT irrigation_date, irrigation_volume FROM irrigation_data ORDER BY irrigation_date ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM sensors_data WHERE temperature > 25 ORDER BY sensor_name DESC;
SELECT sensor_name, temperature, humidity FROM sensors_data WHERE humidity < 60;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name, temperature, humidity FROM sensors_data WHERE humidity < 70 AND temperature > 20 ORDER BY sensor_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM sensors_data INNER JOIN irrigation_data ON sensors_data.sensor_id = irrigation_data.crop_id WHERE irrigation_volume > 100 ORDER BY irrigation_date DESC;
SELECT sensor_name, temperature FROM sensors_data WHERE temperature BETWEEN 25 AND 30 AND humidity < 50;
SELECT * FROM SensorData;
SELECT sensor_type, temperature FROM SensorData WHERE sensor_location = 'Living Room';
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type, reading_time FROM SensorData WHERE temperature > 30;
SELECT * FROM SensorData ORDER BY reading_time DESC;
SELECT sensor_type, AVG(temperature) AS avg_temp FROM SensorData GROUP BY sensor_type;
SELECT * FROM SensorData WHERE temperature > 30 ORDER BY reading_time DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT sensor_type, AVG(temperature) AS average_temperature FROM SensorData GROUP BY sensor_type HAVING AVG(temperature) > 25 ORDER BY average_temperature DESC
SELECT sensor_location, MAX(moisture) AS max_moisture FROM SensorData WHERE reading_time > '2022-01-01' GROUP BY sensor_location ORDER BY max_moisture DESC
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type, temperature FROM SensorData WHERE sensor_type = 'humidity_sensor' AND moisture < 50 ORDER BY sensor_id ASC
SELECT * FROM SensorData WHERE temperature BETWEEN 20 AND 30 AND moisture BETWEEN 40 AND 60 ORDER BY sensor_id DESC
SELECT sensor_name, location FROM Sensors;
SELECT * FROM Measurements WHERE temperature > 25;
SELECT crop_name, planting_date FROM Crops ORDER BY planting_date DESC;
SELECT system_name, location FROM Irrigation_System WHERE sensor_id = 1;
SELECT sensor_name, sensor_type FROM Sensors WHERE location = 'Field';
SELECT * FROM Sensors WHERE location = 'Field 1';
SELECT sensor_name, sensor_type FROM Sensors WHERE sensor_type = 'Temperature';
SELECT * FROM Measurements WHERE temperature > 30 AND humidity < 60;
SELECT sensor_name, location FROM Sensors ORDER BY sensor_name DESC;
SELECT crop_name, planting_date FROM Crops WHERE crop_type = 'Vegetable' ORDER BY planting_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Sensors;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type, location FROM Sensors ORDER BY sensor_id DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type, location FROM Sensors WHERE location = 'Farm A';
SELECT sensor_id, AVG(value) AS avg_value FROM Measurements GROUP BY sensor_id HAVING AVG(value) > 50;
SELECT field_name, crop_name, area FROM Fields f JOIN Crops c ON f.crop_id = c.crop_id ORDER BY area DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type, location, installation_date FROM Sensors ORDER BY installation_date DESC;
SELECT measurement_id, sensor_id, value, timestamp FROM Measurements WHERE value > 100 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT crop_id, crop_name, crop_type FROM Crops WHERE crop_type = 'Fruit' ORDER BY crop_name;
SELECT field_id, field_name, crop_id, area FROM Fields WHERE area > 1000 ORDER BY field_id;
SELECT schedule_id, field_id, start_time, end_time, frequency FROM IrrigationSchedule WHERE frequency = 'Daily' ORDER BY start_time;
